name: Cattack! (FlamezGames)
description: just btw, you might have to click the green flag multiple times to get it to run right, scratch has a very weird issue when it comes to that.      CONTROLS.  WASD or Arrow Keys to move, click to dash, (dashing is your attack/yarn wrap)  you can dash every 0.3 seconds. there are a few bugs, such as there was a way to see the dash charge, but it bugged, i ran out of time, the jam ends in less than an hour and i haven't been able to fix it. now, enjoy! onto the overview. in this game, you're a yarn ball! Wrap the cats in yarn before they can unravel you, this was made in around 4 hours.
